Putin has orchestrated this coup for months. Said parts of Ukraine are independent, then invades & retakes all of Ukraine. 1922 saw the creation of the Soviet Union. 2022 is Putin‚Äôs remake of the Soviet Union. That is what he wants his legacy to be. We must have severe sanctions.

80 years ago today, President Roosevelt signed EO 9066, leading to the forced internment of over 120,000 people of Japanese ancestry during World War II. As we vow ‚Äònever again‚Äô we must admit it could happen again lest we forget. That is why we observe this #DayofRemembrance. https://t.co/hkijJxdO68

In honor of #BlackHistoryMonth, @DemWomenCaucus is discussing strategies to address inequities & injustices in our health care system to save lives! https://t.co/q50SdFe2pl

The pandemic has underscored a fact already known to working parents-our child care system is broken. Despite @GOPoversight's claims, @HouseDemocrats showed we CAN address toxic workplaces by passing @RepCheri's bipartisan bill to end forced arbitration https://t.co/wec4oRB66a

Good news. @RepCheri‚Äôs bill to end the rigged process of forced arbitration passed in the House. 60 million workers have signed clauses, yet most don't know it, & only 2% win their cases! A total sham. The Senate must quickly pass this bipartisan bill & restore survivors' rights.

If you care about your wife, mother, daughter, woman friend, this should outrage you. Men have officially recovered in terms of labor force participation, women have NOT - 1.1 MILLION fewer women in the labor force since the start of the pandemic. We need child care/pre-k! https://t.co/yUbgDO5bpH

Survivors of the predatory environment at the Washington football team suffered vile experiences 100s of times, some on a daily basis. A message must be sent to all @NFL teams. Still reeling from the Washington Football Team hearing. How do you look a victim in the eye and shame and blame her like this? 
The victim attacks by @GOPoversight was beneath the dignity of our office.

The victim blaming & shaming that @GOPoversight is engaging in w/ survivors of sexual harassment by Dan Snyder & his org is why victims in workplaces throughout the country don‚Äôt come forward. It‚Äôs why predators get away with these sickening offenses. They‚Äôre part of the problem.
You can watch my @OversightDems colleagues and our roundtable investigation with the survivors here: https://t.co/vHbPi7ln4V

Watch CSPAN 3. Disgusting what Dan Snyder/Washington Commanders got away with. @NFL must lose its tax exempt status-$100 million dollars over 10 years. The Commanders are a sexual predator haven. What happened to Snyder? Lose his draft picks? Be suspended? Have charges filed? NO!

My heart & prayers go out to @RepYvetteClarke & her family with the devastating loss of her longtime life partner, Charles Durham. His love, strength & support has been an important part of Yvette‚Äôs public service & success. It doesn‚Äôt end with his passing. Their love lives on.

White supremacists must be stopped. More than 12 bomb threats have been made to historically Black colleges and universities in the last 2 days. No coincidence it‚Äôs during Black History Month. https://t.co/4UZurWthBe

Wake up Virginia Republicans. The US military has implemented a policy on sexual assault that you just rejected. Do you not care about the safety of your cadets? VMI has a horrible record of tolerating violence against women. Shame. https://t.co/mRXnmQskl3

We owe it to David & his loved ones to share his story & never give up our fight to end gun violence. We owe it to the more than 110 Americans killed each day with guns. We owe it to 34,000 American students that were exposed to gun violence in 2021 alone. This madness must end! https://t.co/RI5OGgYoiu

They will always wonder what David, who was only 28 years old and so full of promise, would have achieved had his life not been taken from him so cruelly? No doubt great things given his dedication to our country and to protect & serve his community during his short time with us.

Like Army Veteran & Alameda County Sheriff's Cadet David Nguyen, who was murdered in a freeway shooting earlier this month. His senseless loss will be felt for generations to come. His family, friends, colleagues & community bear scars on their hearts. https://t.co/qcnhUlY91i

Guilt for those who didn‚Äôt survive, fear of being shot again, having our bodies twitch when a car backfires or fireworks are lit, scars that are constant reminders of our contorted bodies & a sense of hopelessness that nothing will change. There will be more of us & more deaths.
We rightfully focus on the loss of life to gun violence. It is profound. Those left behind to grieve are victims as well. Those, like me, who have been shot and survived carry a lot of baggage.
It is a crime to destroy presidential records. Trump tearing up official documents is a crime. Funny. Maybe that‚Äôs how he will go to jail. https://t.co/GJjauUmxbI

Happy Lunar New Year! During the year of the Tiger, we must celebrate our diversity and continue the fight against the hatred and racism that hurts AAPI communities across America for a brighter, safer, more auspicious, and peaceful New Year. #HappyLunarNewYear https://t.co/ndPadDBweY

The pandemic has underscored how critically important Social Security is to our country. It has NEVER missed a payment. 

I proudly cosponsored @RepJohnLarson's Social Security 2100: A Sacred Trust Act because we must protect and improve benefits now, and for generations to come. https://t.co/CX8XILgy87
Funny, I don‚Äôt remember hearing Republicans accuse Reagan or Trump, both of whom vowed to appoint a woman to the Supreme Court, of affirmative action or litmus tests.  https://t.co/0lDYpoBGVq
Good foundations make great futures! Today we are celebrating the completion of 3092 foundations for the electrification of Caltrain. https://t.co/uMyZDam11G

Thank you to our indomitable @SpeakerPelosi for cosponsoring my resolution with @RepMaloney affirming that the Equal Rights Amendment is the 28th Amendment to the Constitution! As the Speaker always says, ‚Äúwhen women succeed, America succeeds!‚Äù

Upon returning home I wanted to learn more about my family‚Äôs story and was profoundly shocked to find out that my grandfather was taken as part of Kristallnacht and imprisoned in Buchenwald for 1 month. My grandparents never talked about it.

Visiting Auschwitz in person, as I did just a few months ago, drives home the horrors of this dark chapter in history. The fact that the world looked on while these atrocities were carried out is unforgivable.

On the 77th anniversary of the liberation of Auschwitz-Birkenau, we mourn and honor the 6 million Jews and other victims murdered by the Nazis. We must guard against rising antisemitism and hate at home & abroad to ensure these heinous acts are never forgotten & never repeated.

The ERA has met all requirements for ratification under the Constitution & is our 28th Amendment. The Archivist must publish it immediately. Women deserve equal justice under the law! https://t.co/j0bS6gaevj

@RepMaloney & I are introducing our resolution recognizing today as the day the ERA becomes the 28th Amendment. The Archivist must certify the ERA & finally recognize women‚Äôs equality under the law! https://t.co/0cUnxo0Dx3

We‚Äôve ratified the ERA; now we must enshrine it in our Constitution. Women in America continue to be victims of insidious discrimination & the Constitution has been an apologist for the bad behavior. 85% of UN countries have the ERA in their constitutions, it‚Äôs time we do too!

We must move sexual harassment cases from the chain of command and implement independent investigations. Our servicemembers should be focused on the enemy outside the wire, not defending themselves from within their own ranks.

.@POTUS has signed an EO establishing sexual harassment as a military offense based on my I Am Vanessa Guill√©n Act provision in the NDAA. This is a testament to Vanessa's legacy and her family's resiliency, and I commend Biden's action on this critical issue. But more is needed! https://t.co/S0h8GhCT8T

@POTUS has signed an EO establishing sexual harassment as a military offense based on my I Am Vanessa Guill√©n Act provision in the NDAA. It‚Äôs been one year since @POTUS reversed Trump‚Äôs bigoted and discriminatory ban against our brave transgender military servicemembers. While today is cause for celebration, we must also ensure no president can ever again threaten their service & our military readiness and morale. https://t.co/nSgTb7LzaA
You can read my full statement on the #Roe49 anniversary here: https://t.co/viFJpleXBx

Today‚Äôs anniversary of #RoeVWade is cast in shadow; we're facing the possibility there may not be a 50th anniversary. But our fight for Roe, & for better than Roe, will never end. We will pass the Women's Health Protection Act so that abortion rights are codified for all. #WHPA https://t.co/WATdEHF6Kf

We've always known Roe wasn‚Äôt enough to ensure people-especially indigenous people, people of color & people working to make ends meet-can get the care they need. The liberated future of abortion is it must be accessible, affordable & supported with love & compassion.

The vast majority of Americans understand #AbortionIsEssential & support abortion rights. So I refuse to allow 6 people to tell 80% of America that their interests don‚Äôt count, that precedent in the Supreme Court doesn‚Äôt count. https://t.co/sD8ekJjnZv

Let‚Äôs talk about the facts. 1 in 4 women has had an abortion & benefited from the freedom to make that decision. I'm 1 of those women. The abortion I had later in pregnancy saved my life & allowed me to have another child, care for my family & dedicate my life to public service. https://t.co/EjH2yfG5Ll
This is serious. A President calling out the military to seize voting machines is akin to a tin pot dictator https://t.co/3xPFXDCCEI

.@RepAdamSmith, @RepMarkTakano and I also sent a letter to @DoD_USD_PR asking for a survey of servicemembers about LGBTQ+ inclusion in the military, including for health care and dependents, building on existing diversity efforts by the services. https://t.co/8WM6ZiGW8F

.@RepAdamSmith, @RepMarkTakano and I wrote @SecDef calling for @DeptofDefense historians to review and document the history of LGBTQ+ military service. We must learn from the past and avoid repeating "Don't Ask, Don't Tell," which led to 100k discharges. https://t.co/Vu4JhdZdX6

It's been 10 yrs since "Don‚Äôt Ask, Don‚Äôt Tell." Most servicemembers today have served with lesbian, gay & bisexual peers for the majority of their careers. We need a historical review and survey of LGBTQ+ servicemembers to ensure this is true 10 years from now for trans troops. https://t.co/rN7vgOeIzE

The National Guard's days of hiding behind its unique status, while Congress foots the $26 Billion annual bill, are over. Congress is shining its spotlight on epic failures in states across the US to protect servicemembers from sexual assault/harassment. Justice will be done! https://t.co/16Y7rvRhI1

Military families shouldn't have fewer rights than those they serve to protect. That's why I led 140 Members in urging @SecDef to waive copays for contraception for military families. This is an investment in servicemembers' health and wellbeing!  https://t.co/VOra5qX3kz

Make no mistake, the Supreme Court has redefined itself today. It has become a rampant political institution and blind justice does not exist. Take the blind fold off Lady Justice. https://t.co/dTppOacMXT

I‚Äôm a proud co-sponsor of #HR2590 to ensure that US-supplied defense equipment and funds are not used to carry out evictions or demolitions, which only further annexation and systematic injustice in the West Bank and East Jerusalem.

Where is the humanity? On what basis did the Israeli police evict a family of 15 in the cold of night in East Jerusalem and beat and arrest the male family members! What 2-state solution can be had with continued actions like these? https://t.co/pPYI2z6xYH
You can read our letter to @SecDef Austin here: https://t.co/TukKQkd0Eg.

141 Members of Congress, led by @DemWomenCaucus and @ProChoiceCaucus, are urging @SecDef to waive contraceptive copays for servicemembers and their families. Our military families deserve the same health care benefits, without cost barriers, as civilians!

The filibuster has been supported by Senate Rs & 2 Ds under the guise of protecting minority rule. Just wait til McConnell gets the gavel again-he‚Äôll shelve the rule in a hot second. Btw, the filibuster has been waived 160x. I guess voting rights just isn‚Äôt important enough.

Al Capone didn‚Äôt go to prison for all the murders, he went down for tax evasion. Donald Trump is guilty of bank and insurance fraud, and I‚Äôm sure before all is said and done tax evasion. AG Garland, it‚Äôs time to start the process.

My hearing on the failure of states to address rampant sexual assault/harassment in the National Guard is starting NOW. Not only does this scourge destroy troops' careers and lives, it poisons morale, readiness and every aspect of service. Watch live at: https://t.co/OkPuFDrFmB

Chairing a hearing at 2 p.m. today about the failure of states to address sexual assault/harassment in the National Guard. Governors are supposed to be in charge, yet Congress foots the bill. I will hold accountable states that fail to address this threat. https://t.co/OkPuFDrFmB https://t.co/m6IorPzewF

Frustrated with empty shelves in drugstores? The White House is stepping up to help. As of today, you can order four FREE COVID-19 tests per household. https://t.co/cbpC65aL9s
‚ÄúGive us the ballot, and we will transform the salient misdeeds of bloodthirsty mobs into the calculated good deeds of orderly citizens.‚Äù

‚ÄúGive us the ballot, and we will no longer plead to the federal government for passage of an anti-lynching law; we will by the power of our vote write the law on the statute books of the South and bring an end to the dastardly acts of the hooded perpetrators of violence."

We must remember King‚Äôs words in his 1957 speech:

‚ÄúGive us the ballot, and we will no longer have to worry the federal government about our basic rights."

On this #MartinLutherKingDay we must ask ourselves what would the civil rights hero say, and we must answer honestly. He would have condemned moderates valuing an arcane Senate rule more than the bedrock constitutional right to vote.
https://t.co/rWu9ossGsB via @sfchronicle
Praying for the hostages at Congregation Beth Israel Synagogue in Texas. May they be rescued safely.
The Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act will make our roads and bridges safer and more efficient, fewer skid marks and accidents. https://t.co/dBbvJd4rRA

The #ChildTaxCredit helped over 93,000 children & provided $138.9 million to families in my district. The bills continue to arrive this month, but hard working families have been abandoned, stripped of a critical lifeline even as the pandemic continues. The Senate must pass BBB!

The @USNationalGuard has been called on at unprecedented levels, not seen since WWII, to not only support communities, but protect our Capitol & democracy. Their service is just as worthy of GI Bill benefits as active-duty servicemembers. Proud to support @RepMikeLevin's bill. https://t.co/HT9Dt7rlks
Other serious symptoms to look out for are chest pain/pressure, confusion, an inability to sleep or wake, and pale/gray/blue skin tone. For more info, go to https://t.co/XX7lmRv2mB

I just spoke to Dr Susan Ehrlich at @ZSFGCare and @SF_DPH about the rise of COVID cases & impact on our hospitals. Most cases are mild & don't require hospitalization. If you have normal cold/flu symptoms stay home! Seek medical help for serious symptoms, like trouble breathing.

In case you missed it, @OversightDems held a hearing on reforming the Federal Information Security Management Act-which hasn‚Äôt been updated since 2014! I said in the hearing, & will say it again, the fed govnt shouldn‚Äôt contract one penny to firms that fail to stay cybersecure. https://t.co/NfZzsTHLaL

Last year, 19 states enacted 34 laws attacking voter rights. GOP state legislators tried to pass another 400. The end game: Jim Crow 2.0. Using voter suppression & election subversion to gain control. @POTUS called it totalitarianism. I call it fascism. Either way, it must stop! https://t.co/vtnIl3Gw0l
This is really sick. Sen Rand Paul keeps inciting crazies to drive across country to kill Dr. Fauci. That should be a crime. https://t.co/T5Bw4vplio
Angelou also wrote: "A wise woman wishes to be no one's enemy; a wise woman refuses to be anyone's victim.‚Äù https://t.co/H1OC3JXDKY

I can think of few women more fitting or gratifying to kick off the American Women Quarters Program than activist & poet Maya Angelou, who wrote:  
"If you're going to live, leave a legacy. Make a mark on the world that can't be erased." https://t.co/GrWmLVbltR

This is serious. We continue to hollow out jobs for women. Women gained just 25% of the jobs in December. Women‚Äôs labor force participation is now at 1991 levels. Build Back Better is about restoring jobs for women.
Bravo @libradunn for prioritizing mental health! Getting the help we need is a sign of strength and love for ourselves & those around us. https://t.co/pu1L9VJ2dX

Fanone reminds us it was police officers, w/different backgrounds & political ideologies, who defended democracy on #January6th. "When they put on the uniform, they set those differences aside to respond to the capitol, protect members of congress, their staff & fight like hell." https://t.co/YyumxVrkUC

Former Officer Mike Fanone's journey from Trump voter in 2016 to Biden voter in 2020 is so revealing. Many Americans are still conned by Trump's rhetoric and pandering. That's why we must speak the truth, over and over again, to dispel his lies. Our democracy depends on it! https://t.co/MXCwRsppGf

Fanone's take on Trump's attacks on the press and truth to spread his lies, distort reality, and whitewash history are spot on. Not only did the ex-president erode confidence in the media he convinced many "these were fraudulent institutions" and "to basically turn off." https://t.co/hGMt0OFLct

My heart broke hearing @SergeantAqGo share for the first time that he has survivor‚Äôs guilt for letting Officer Fanone relieve him after two hours of being battered by the mob on the front line in the tunnel. He went to the back for 5 mins. When he returned, Fanone was gone. https://t.co/t5Lx7Bt2sU

Despite suffering injuries that required multiple surgeries, @SergeantAqGo was back at work on Jan 7. He even had to be ordered to go to the doctor! His reasons for returning - to protect democracy, the system we live in & his family's future - show true heroism & patriotism. https://t.co/UQ0gbFJ3wi

Republican claims that the January 6th Capitol assault was just a protest or ‚Äònormal tourist visit‚Äô are lies. @SergeantAqGo was there. Were it not for him, former Officer Mike Fanone and the other U.S. Capitol and DC Metropolitan police, Trump‚Äôs coup would have succeeded. https://t.co/7iVmFEzvIi

In my talk w/Mike Fanone & @SergeantAqGo, Fanone gave ironclad proof #January6th was a deadly coup. The mob didn't stop after dragging him out of the tunnel. "I was by myself in the crowd, just trying to survive. (They) chose to beat me, torture me & attempt to take my life." https://t.co/t0VU1SG7G4

I‚Äôve had many powerful & poignant moments in my life. I‚Äôve been to Selma, Omaha Beach, Seneca Falls. Talking with 2 American heroes that saved our democracy a year ago stands out as a real high point. Mike Fanone and Aquilino Gonell are American patriots. https://t.co/KIsGHNdMvb

I remember putting my cheek on the cold floor of the gallery when the shots rang out #Jan6th. I thought ‚Äúthis is it.‚Äù If not for the bravery of the @CapitolPolice & @DCPoliceDept we would be living under an autocracy now. That‚Äôs how close we came to losing our precious democracy.
